description: Primes p such that x^5 = 11 has a solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A040180 relative to A000040. - _Bruno Berselli_, Sep 13 2012
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok [p_ ]:=Reduce[Mod[x^5 - 11, p ]== 0, x, Integers ]=!= False; Select[Prime[Range[150]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 12 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(400) | exists(t) {x : x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^5 eq 11}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 12 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
